intro: Since 2015, we have worked to reduce the environmental impact of construction, inspired by the circular economy. After 4 years of research, we started operations in 2020 and today more than 100 companies have improved their sustainability with our eco materials.

vision.descripcion: To be a leading company in the innovation of eco-friendly services and products for the construction sector, reducing its negative impact on the environment.

proposito.descripcion: To be an agent of change to decarbonize the construction industry.
